summary: "The Wild Robot" is an animated science fiction film that came out in 2024. It's about a robot named Roz who gets shipwrecked on an island and has to learn to survive. She makes friends with the animals and becomes a mom to a baby goose named Brightbill. The film is based on a book by Peter Brown and was made by DreamWorks. It has a unique hand-painted look, and the music was composed by Kris Bowers. The movie did well with critics and made over $100 million worldwide.
title: The Wild Robot
